title: Purchase RP problem
body: I bought 4000RP this afternoon and it took double money from my mastercard. However, I only received 4000RP and the purchase history showed that I only purchased once. Help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

For this issue, your best bet would be to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) directly, we here on the boards are unable to assist with billing or account specific inquiries.
